name: Lee Enfield: Tournament of Death
overview: The second in The Time Troubleshooter series in which our hero finds himself in the 13th century. His adventure takes place in the Castle of teh Count of Savoy where the Holy Shroud, one of the world's greatest relics, is kept under close guard by the soldiers of Yellow Shadow, Lee's sworn enemy. Lee has been instructed to find the relic before Yellow Shadow destroys it. He will need a lot of courage and skill to fight his way through numerous rooms and hidden passages as specially trained guards, foot soldiers and even bears bar his way. His chance of succeeding is very low but Lee Enfield is the man who likes a challenge and there are objects to find which will aid him in his mission. Game re-released by Players Premier in 1990.
